name: digital-foundry-downloader
description: DF Downloader is an application designed to download the latest Digital Foundry videos when they are available

scripts.install-all-deps: cd df-downloader-common && npm i && cd ../df-downloader-ui && npm i && cd ../df-downloader-service && npm i
scripts.build: cd df-downloader-common && npm i && npm run build && cd ../df-downloader-ui && npm run full-build && cd ../df-downloader-service && npm run full-build && npm run get-ui
scripts.remove:code: cd df-downloader-common && npm run remove && cd ../df-downloader-ui && npm run remove && cd ../df-downloader-service && npm run remove
scripts.remove:all: npm run remove:config && npm run remove:data && npm run remove:code
